import React, { Component } from "react"; class Cart extends Component { state = { arr: [], total: 0, quantity: '', q: 1, }; deleteFromCart = id => { fetch(`http://localhost:5000/shopping-cart/${id}`, { method: "DELETE" }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(() => this.componentDidMount()); }; updateQuantity =(value, id) => { this.setState({quantity: event.target.value}); fetch(`http://localhost:5000/shopping-cart/${id}`, { method: "PATCH", body: JSON.stringify({ quantity: event.target.value }), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" } }) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => console.log(data)); }; componentDidMount() { fetch("http://localhost:5000/shopping-cart") .then(res => res.json()) .then(arr => this.setState({ arr: arr, total: arr.reduce((total, x) => (total += x.quantity * x.price), 0) }) ); } render() { return (
{this.state.arr.map(x => ( ))}
PRODUCT
PRICE
QUANTITY
REMOVE

total

); } } export default Cart;
